LanguageData.ARA_Proj_EggSac.label: Arachnae Egg
LanguageData.ARA_InteractiveEggSac.label: Arachnae Egg Sac
LanguageData.ARA_InteractiveEggSac.description: A fragile, flammable, and slimy sac, which is an egg laid by the Arachnae Queen. It contains the nutrients and genetic material needed to nurture a new overseer drone. The activation process is completed through interaction with the Arachnae Queen—refer to the egg's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of each overseer drone. The egg sac is extremely sensitive to temperature (the optimal temperature for this type of egg is -25~30°C) and requires careful protection!
LanguageData.ARA_Cocoon_Medicine.label: Arachnae Healing Cocoon
LanguageData.ARA_Cocoon_Medicine.description: A living structure hatched and built by an Arachnae Artisan. Injured insectoids can be placed inside to receive treatment and recovery using Insect Jelly. A living structure!
LanguageData.ARA_Cocoon_Medicine_From_Death.label: Arachnae Healing Cocoon (Death)
